did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Printouts of two works of fiction Bradbury finished in 2004, Minor Incidents, which is a rewrite of the 1970 A Crocodile of Choirboys, and Williams Mix.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Printouts of two works of fiction Bradbury finished in 2004, Minor Incidents, which is a rewrite of the 1970 A Crocodile of Choirboys, and Williams Mix.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
